CWEs: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function does not validate or sanitize the input from the request headers which can lead to SQL Injection if the input is used in a SQL query. The function also does not sanitize the URL which can lead to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks if the URL is rendered on a web page. The function also does not handle errors properly which can lead to information disclosure.
